br.com.neppo.cache.memcached

Class Memcached<K,V>

  • java.lang.Object
    • br.com.neppo.cache.memcached.Memcached<K,V>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cache<K,V>

    public class Memcached<K,V>
extends Object
implements Cache<K,V>
    Cache Cache implementation that wraps an MemcachedClient instance.
    Author:
    bhlangonijr

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Memcached(String name, net.spy.memcached.MemcachedClient cache)
      Constructs a new Memcached instance with the given cache.
      Memcached(String name, net.spy.memcached.MemcachedClient cache, int ttl, CacheTranscoder cacheTranscoder)
      Constructs a new Memcached instance with the given cache.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clear()
      Clear all entries from the cache.
      void close()
      Close and release de resources for current cache instance
      V get(K key)
      Returns the Cached value stored under the specified key or null if there is no Cache entry for that key.
      V getAndTouch(K key, int ttl)
      Returns the Cached value stored under the specified key or null if there is no Cache entry for that key.
      CacheTranscoder getCacheTranscoder() 
      long getDiskStoreSize()
      Returns the size (in bytes) that this Memcached's disk store is consuming or -1 if that number is unknown or cannot be calculated.
      long getMemoryStoreSize()
      Returns the size (in bytes) that this Memcached's memory store is using (RAM), or -1 if that number is unknown or cannot be calculated.
      long getMemoryUsage()
      Returns the size (in bytes) that this Memcached is using in memory (RAM), or -1 if that number is unknown or cannot be calculated.
      String getName() 
      ThreadLocal<? extends net.spy.memcached.transcoders.Transcoder<?>> getThreadLocalTranscoder() 
      int getTtl() 
      void put(K key, V value)
      Adds a Cache entry.
      void put(K key, V value, int ttl)
      Adds a Cache entry.
      V putAndGet(K key, V value)
      Adds a Cache entry and return the previous value.
      V putAndGet(K key, V value, int ttl)
      Adds a Cache entry and return the previous value.
      V remove(K key)
      Remove the cache entry corresponding to the specified key.
      void setThreadLocalTranscoder(ThreadLocal<? extends net.spy.memcached.transcoders.Transcoder<?>> threadLocalTranscoder) 
      void setTtl(int ttl) 
      int size()
      Returns the number of entries in the cache.
      String toString()
      Returns "Memcached [" + cache.getName() + "]"
